snippet.title: Witch Strandings | Announcement Trailer [4K]
snippet.description:
Witch Strandings comes to a forest near you on the 7th of July. 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1507790/Witch_Strandings/

You are a strand of light in a top-down open world inspired by dark fairytales. Create pathways through the darkness, nurture the creatures of the Forest, repair ancient structures, and ultimately: confront the Witch who broke this place.

Witch Strandings dials into the emerging genre of physical transportation. A digital forest that extends beyond the boundaries of your screen, in an all-new Strand-type game.

Featuring Original Score from composer Peter Michael Davison 
https://petermichaeldavison.com/

Follow us on Twitter: https://linktr.ee/strangescaffold
Join our newsletter: https://bit.ly/3txnrV0
Get in the community on Discord: https://discord.gg/mDvhmA7jDS

🧙🏽‍♀️ Developed by Strange Scaffold
🐺 Published by Modern Wolf
